entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
